summary: A test module that sets up lightweight dummy components and inputs to quickly verify the core functionality of the GLIGEN-enabled Stable Diffusion pipeline, including attention slicing, batch inference consistency, and specific diffusion scheduler configurations.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of the GLIGEN diffusion pipeline during development by providing fast, deterministic unit tests that catch regressions in key features such as attention handling, batch processing, and scheduler behavior.
